title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 34.2 - Temporary provision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 34.2 - Temporary provision

State Regulations

Notwithstanding section
34.1
of this Part, until September
1, 1954, such school districts may, in the alternative, use the debt statement
form prescribed by Part 31 of the Department of Audit and Control rules and
regulations entitled "Debt Statement Form To Be Used in Connection With Public

Sales of Bonds by Counties, Towns, Villages and Cities Under 125,000

Inhabitants", with such appropriate changes as may be required to comply with
provisions of the Local Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
34.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
